posts.title: Maldives
posts.description: The MALDIVES is a destination like none other; a tiny island nation in the Indian Ocean with immaculate beaches, the clearest blue waters, incredible marine life, overwater bungalows and so much more â€“ a bucket list destination in every way!
posts.reviews: Best place i've visited this year.

posts.title: Santorini,Greece
posts.description: Santorini is a small island located in the Cyclades group of islands in Greece. It is famous for its stunning natural beauty, including its white-washed buildings, blue-domed churches, and dramatic cliffs.
posts.Reviews: This place was the real definition of aesthetic

posts.title: Diani,Kenya
posts.description: Diani,extends along the Indian Ocean coast in Kenya and it is a spectacular location for a beach holiday in Kenya. It has a magnificent background of forests with the sounds of various animals serenading you that will really make a perfect destination
posts.Reviews: You have not experienced life if you have not visited Diani.
